['"The whole is greater than the sum of its parts." - This maxim emphasizes the importance of synergy and how the combination of individual elements can create something more valuable and powerful than the individual elements themselves.', '"Less is more." - This maxim encourages simplicity and the idea that sometimes, reducing the amount of elements or complexity can lead to a more effective and efficient outcome.', '"The best is the enemy of the good." - This maxim highlights the potential dangers of perfectionism and the importance of recognizing when something is good enough, rather than striving for perfection.', '"One should not judge a book by its cover." - This maxim cautions against making judgments based on appearance alone and encourages looking beyond surface-level characteristics to understand the true nature of something.', '"The whole world is a laboratory for the experimentation of thought." - This maxim emphasizes the importance of being open-minded and willing to explore new ideas and perspectives, as well as the value of experimentation and taking calculated risks.', '"In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity." - This maxim encourages a positive mindset and the idea that even in challenging situations, there are opportunities for growth and learning.', '"The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall." - This maxim highlights the importance of resilience and perseverance in the face of adversity.', '"There is no such thing as a hopeless situation', '"The best way to predict your future is to create it." - This maxim encourages taking proactive steps to shape one\'s own destiny and create the future one desires.', '"Learn as if you were to live forever, and live like you are going to die tomorrow." - This maxim highlights the importance of balancing short-term and long-term goals, and the value of living in the present while also planning for the future.']
